body:
Comment 1 by **amdragon**: 
remove-text-properties has a different interface from remove-list-of-text-properties 
so it is not safe to simply alias the name.  However, remove-text-properties is 
present in both Emacs and XEmacs, so we could simply replace the use of remove-list-
of-text-properties with remove-text-properties and put nil's after both properties in 
the list passed to the function.

I have some other pending changes to go-mode, but if this hasn't been fixed when those 
go in, I'll make a CL.
